name: Research Collect (Step 1 of 2)
description: 7 AM — Scans creator feeds and trending content, saves a daily research note to Obsidian. The 8 AM job reads this note for transcript pulls.

payload.message:
Use yoinkit to collect today's content research:

1. Check YouTube and TikTok trending
2. Pull recent feeds from: @MrBeast, @mkbhd, @ali-abdaal (YouTube), @garyvee (TikTok)
3. Search YouTube and Reddit for 'AI tools' and 'creator economy'

For each piece of content found, record:
- Platform, creator, title, URL, view count, publish date
- Flag anything from the last 24 hours as NEW

Save the results as a markdown note to the Obsidian vault at:
`Research/Daily/YYYY-MM-DD-collection.md`

Use this format for each item:
```
## [Platform] Creator — Title
- URL: ...
- Views: ... | Published: ...
- Status: NEW or EXISTING
- Transcript: PENDING
```

Do NOT pull transcripts yet — that's the next job's responsibility.
